# polytomic_mysql_connection (Data Source)

MySQL Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_mysql_connection" "mysql" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```

### Nested Schema for `configuration`

- `ssh_port` (Number) SSH port
